status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f3t8h","text":"To purify mCherry-WIPI2d and mCherry-WIPI3, as described previously for WIPI2d (Fracchiolla et al. 2020, J Cell Biol, PMID: 32437499), fuse the coding sequence of WIPI2d or WIPI3 to a N-terminal 6xHis-TEV-mCherry-tag through cloning into a pET-DUET1 vector (available from Addgene). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a57v5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8a09h","text":"After the transformation of the pET-DUET1 vector encoding 6xHis-TEV-mCherry-WIPI2d/WIPI3 in E. coli Rosetta pLysS cells (Novagen Cat# 70956-4), grow the cells in 2x Tryptone Yeast extract (TY) medium at   until an OD600 of 0.4 and then continue at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":216,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":203,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":248,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7os7d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2pmnr","text":"Once the cells reach an OD600 of 0.8, induce the protein expression with   isopropyl β-D-1-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG) for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":26,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":124,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":129,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"pu17","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"134c1","text":"Filter the supernatant through an 0.45 µm filter and load onto a pre-equilibrated 5 ml His-Trap HP column (Cytiva). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eobmh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47cqj","text":"Clear the lysates by centrifugation at    in a SORVAL RC6+ centrifuge with an F21S-8x50Y rotor (Thermo Scientific). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5l4f5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"18000","duration":2700,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6k75u","text":"Collect the cells by centrifugation and resuspend in lysis buffer, complete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (Roche), CIP protease inhibitor (Sigma), and DNase (Sigma)). {"blocks":[{"key":"9kfmr","text":"Pool the fractions containing the 6xHis-TEV-mCherry-WIPI2d/WIPI3, concentrate using a 30 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore) and loade onto a pre-equilibrated Superdex 200 Increase 10/300 GL column (Cytiva). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2c3tp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
